article_title: Wednesday's low coldest temperature of year in Tucson
article_text:
Wednesday morning's low in Tucson was the coldest of the year. The 28-degree mark reached at 6:15 a.m. was as cold as the morning of Dec. 28 of 2014. Here are some other cold temperatures from last night:

Wenesday night/Thursday morning could be colder in some areas. Tucson's low is forecasted to be 27 degrees. If we hit that it will be coldest in nearly three years.
